Parameters: Effect: The effect that has been updated.
Object: A value that gives more information about the update. See the effect's documentation for more details on what this object is.
onEffectUpdated(android.media.effect.Eff.Description: Called when the effect state is updated.
onEffectUpdated(android.media.effect.Eff.FullName: public abstract void onEffectUpdated (Effect effect, Object info)

ClassDesc: Some effects may issue callbacks to inform the host of changes to the effect state. This is the listener interface for receiving those callbacks.
